trait.name: Dive Attack
trait.text: If you are flying and dive at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 1d6 damage to the target.

trait.name: Talons
trait.text: You are proficient with your unarmed strikes, which deal 1d4 slashing damage on a hit.

trait.name: Language
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Auran.
